entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow except freezing rain over southern sections early this morning. Amount 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
